compliance.title: Implement EU AI Act Policy Templates
compliance.description: Create a library of Rego policy templates that align with the requirements of the EU AI Act (e.g., transparency, risk assessment, human oversight).
compliance.rationale: As a governance platform, providing pre-built templates for major regulatory frameworks like the EU AI Act adds significant value for enterprise customers.

compliance.title: Automate SOC2 Compliance Reporting
compliance.description: Develop a service that aggregates audit logs and governance decisions to generate automated SOC2 compliance reports for auditors.
compliance.rationale: SOC2 compliance is a mandatory requirement for most enterprise software. Automating the report generation process reduces the burden on compliance teams.
